activity.text:
> Tip
> 
> For best results, initiate chat on the files or code changes.
> 
> @AdityaJ2305 The nitpick comment suggests improving the pluralization handling in `public/locale/en.json`. Here's how to implement it:
> 
> 1. Update the translation keys in `public/locale/en.json`:
> 
> ```json
> {
>   "entity_count_one": "{{count}} {{entity}}",
>   "entity_count_other": "{{count}} {{entityPlural}}"
> }
> ```
> 
> 2. When using the translation, provide both singular and plural forms:
> 
> ```ts
> t("entity_count", {
>   count: facilities?.count || 0,
>   entity: "Facility",
>   entityPlural: "Facilities"
> })
> ```
> 
> This approach will handle irregular plurals correctly (like "person"/"people") instead of just adding 's' to the singular form. Would you like me to help you implement this change across all the files?
> 
> üîó Analysis chain
> üèÅ Scripts executed

Hey Team, Do we really need to do that ? It just makes it too complex for simple translation
